City Services

\*PLEASE NOTE:
Your garbage / poly cart MUST be out by 7:00 AM to ensure service. GFL provides pickup services on Wednesdays between 7:00 AM and 7:00 PM.

Regular Trash Pickup -
Every Wednesday

Heavy Trash Pickup -
Every Other Wednesday

[View our Calendar](https://www.cityofneedville.com/calendar)

* is picked up every Wednesday.

  is picked up every other Wednesday.
* If your trash is
  picked up, please call GFL as soon as possible to report the issue at
  **[(281) 368-8397](tel:(281) 368-8397)**
* Placement of your poly cart in the correct position is critical to servicing your residence as this collection is done by automation.
* Poly Carts can be replaced by calling Needville City Hall at
  **[(979) 793-4253](tel:979-793-4253)**
* The City of Needville amended a portion on the contract with GFL. Residents inside the city limits with a water/sewer/trash bill are allowed (1) one quarterly access at the Fort Bend Landfill. Please read the agreement below.

  If you have any questions, please contact City Hall
  **[(979) 793-4253](tel:979-793-4253)**
  or GFL Environmental
  **[(281) 368-8397](tel:(281) 368-8397)**

  The Agreement for Residential and Commercial Solid Waste Collection Services between the City of Needville, Texas (“City”) and Waste Corporation of Texas, L.P. DBA GFL Environmental (“Contractor”)is hereby amended as follows:

  A.      A designated area of the Fort Bend Landfill will be available to the residents of the City of Needville, Texas for the disposal of Bulky Waste. The landfill will be open from 8am – 12pm, on the first Saturday of each quarter (January, April, July, October) for the disposal of the Bulky Waste contents of one (1) truck bed or one (1) utility trailer for each resident.

  The description of Bulky Waste is noted in Section 3.1.2 of the Agreement for Residential and Commercial Solid Waste Collection Services between the City and the Contractor.

  Additional poly carts are available for a fee of $9.47 per month and can be requested by contacting City of Needville. Please notify City of Needville if your poly cart has been damaged.
